mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.tongzhi_name as tongzhiName ,a.tongzhi_photo as tongzhiPhoto ,a.tongzhi_file as tongzhiFile ,a.tongzhi_types as tongzhiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.tongzhi_content as tongzhiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail
FROM tongzhi a left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and a.tongzhi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiName},'%')
and a.tongzhi_types = #{params.tongzhiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.tongzhi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiContent},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
